price: No mw’iremwa ryanyu mwebwe abantu, n’iremwa ry’ibindi biremwa bigendagenda bikwiragiye mw’isi, harimwo ivyemezo vyerekana ubushobozi n'ububasha vy’Imana Allah, ku bantu bayemera bakemera n’amabwirizwa yayo ata gukekeranya;
arabic: وَفِي خَلۡقِكُمۡ وَمَا يَبُثُّ مِن دَآبَّةٍ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ

meta.transliteration: wafī khalqikum wamā yabuthu min dābbatin āyātun liqawmin yūqinūna
